Reviews.Title: Excellent cellphone
Reviews.Author: christian chaljub
Reviews.Content: I like this cellphone because is bigThe cellphone is similarly like samsung noteThe camera is good and the battery is longlifeThe service from seller was goodExcellent cellphoneThe relation price and quality is very good

Reviews.Title: This phone reboots itself on all calls over five minutes
Reviews.Author: Mark Vincent
Reviews.Content: I've been using this phone for six months. I don't like the fact it will not play live audio streams that all other phones I have without crashing ever time. This phone also reboots itself on all calls over five minutes. The phone also freezes up on a regular basis.

Reviews.Title: The Blu studio 5.3 S is great and get it!
Reviews.Author: Wilmer Alexander Villalobos
Reviews.Content: The cellular has work pretty good and has impacted a lot of people by its design and performances for the price it cost.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprising
Reviews.Author: S K
Reviews.Content: Liked the performance and design of the phone. Very impressive for the price of the phone. However, the model doen't have magnetic sensor which was not described clearly in product description, I found this out when I called BLU customer support.
